Review.Titre: At first I was excited to become a…
Review.Contenu: At first I was excited to become a member, but have decided to cancel my subscription because I keep getting locked out of my new account. It's been over a week now that I have been back-and-forth with customer support and I still keep getting locked out. I keep trying to recover my username, but the name they send me doesn't work. Beyond frustration.  Security make sures you can't use your account. The whole issue might be resolved quickly if I could actually talk to a human, but alas that's not possible ... they don't provide telephone support!

Review.Titre: Fake free trial BEWARE / Awful completion rate
Review.Contenu: Beware of their "free" 14 days trial. They will bill you immediately because you used their service. I only tried one download and never used them again. Still they billed without notice.I only saw that because I went to Paypal to remove the subscription. Tried to ask for a refund was just told I am screwed because I used it too much (there was apparently a limit I crossed but that was never indicated I never did I get a message telling me I have to pay to go over it...).Don't make the same mistake and avoid them at all cost.Oh and to make matters worse : their completion rate is so bad that my download was useless, impossible to repair. Total waste of time and money.

Review.Titre: I also got duped by their claims of…
Review.Contenu: I also got duped by their claims of "only $X.XX" when that was actually just trickery by them to get me to pay for a full year of service.  The $X.XX price was the yearly price divided by 12 to make it look cheaper.  False advertising!
I had great difficulties logging into my account.

Your prices shot up without notification; you block some groups but don't readily tell us which and for what reason; searching doesn't seem to work.   Takes forever to download headers (like, I've been at it for over two months and still haven't finished.

The beginnings were good.Well, but if you have a free trial period and I'm over without asking, it's a bit embarrassing.I wanted to download, it crashed that the server is not responding and that's it.And when I want to finish the trial period, it crashes that the account is inactive.And how to use it normally.

Review.Titre: was getting low transfer speeds for a…
Review.Contenu: was getting low transfer speeds for a few weeks, got an account with another company and downloads maxxed out again.

Review.Titre: Speed is not as fast as you sell it
Review.Contenu: Speed is not as fast as you sell it. Several drops from 80% of the max speed to 0%…everytime

There are quite a few nzb's which are missing on this service, and not on others in common channels.the speed is fine.the logging (not) is fine.the ssl available is fine.but some content being hit/miss is frustrating sometimes.
The service is good however, the completion rate 99% seems to be a joke. I get many, many failed to complete aborted errors.
Lots of missing articles. When not missing its great
Very good stability. However there could be more usable ports and better speed.

Review.Titre: Rock solid availability of servers and…
Review.Contenu: Rock solid availability of servers and articlesWould like to see better throughput. I have 1.5gbps service but I see a max of 80MBps downloading even including slowdown for encrypted pipe I was hoping to see 100-110MBps

Review.Titre: A top choice in Usenet providers.
Review.Contenu: As a UNS subscriber for over 6 years, I can vouch for their speed and no-frills reliability. I use the service as my primary Usenet account with an annual renewal and a FIOS connection but in my experience an alternate block account from a provider on an NL backbone is worth considering for the best possible completion rate. All in all, UNS is a solid value and has consistently met my needs.

Review.Titre: Usenetserver has never been down when I…
Review.Contenu: Usenetserver has never been down when I wanted to use it.   Once in a while downloads are slow ... but I'm never certain whether my ISP might be the problem.   Comments in the newsgroups about missing or incomplete binaries always seem to be from people using other nntp providers.

Review.Titre: Really great service and a great value…
Review.Contenu: Really great service and a great value for the money, missing one star because retention is really long, but I get a lot of failures on dnload.

Review.Titre: Would've given it 5 stars but search could be better
Review.Contenu: Would've given it 5 stars but the search function isn't the best, misses some posts that others turn up.

Review.Contenu: The service works for what I need, nothing to provide on how to make things better.
Too expensive. For the rest great service, keep up the good retention!
They are reliable, but there are things that have failed in download here and there. These are not common so a 4 star is awarded.

Review.Contenu: In the Header of the messages is No "Path".otherwise I would give five stars

Review.Contenu: Everything I look for is there, the speeds are as fast as I want and the use is so much simpler and easier than hunting all over the web for what I want.
Excellent company with lots of connections and never down (at least not when i use it)

Review.Titre: Great retention and blazing fast speeds…
Review.Contenu: Great retention and blazing fast speeds at an affordable price
very fast, fair price and good retention.

Review.Titre: Slightly slower than GN but FAR more article completion
Review.Contenu: Giganews used to be better, and is still slightly faster (when it has the articles) but for the last 5 years at least, UNS has been my #1 provider overall. Speed is meaningless without article availability, and UNS strikes the balance. I believe it’s still the same farm as newshosting.com and powered by proper infrastructure.

Reliability! There are never outages or disruptions, I don't know how you do it. Having the annual payment is also great. Do they have autopay? I honestly don't know but I image they do because everything is simple and convenient

Review.Titre: it's ALL WAYS there and ready
Review.Contenu: it's all ways there and ready when i need it.

Have been using UsenetServer for 6+ years now, never had an issue that I can think off. During that time ISP got three major speed upgrades and  UsenetServer always delivered maximum speed.  Retention is the main reason I chose them back in the day and it is still amazing today.

Review.Titre: Great service, great support and great team !
Review.Contenu: Super fast, really good quality service, VPN included, really good customer support!!! 10 years of fidelity to this great team and i have never seen the service down, never !You can subscribe and be happy!

I don't have a lot to say. I've been using Usenetserver as my main usenet access for over a decade. Before that I went through 3 different, popular services but weren't always as reliable and gave me reasons to look for another service. There has never been any problems with access or fast download speeds for the entire time I've been a subscriber.

I am a long time UNS customer. It was my first provider on recommendation fromma friend. I have tried others but none measure up to the standard established by UNS. Even when trying others, I have maintained my UNS account because I know they will provide the service I need.

Review.Titre: Used it for years and am still using it.
Review.Contenu: The great thing about Usenet Server is that it's just never an issue.  I sometimes forget that it's even a subscription because it always works and I never have to complain.  I've subscribed for YEARS and the reliability has always been better than any ISP I've used.  Retention is great.  It works seamlessly with my newsreader.  I don't use Global Search as much as I should but it's always been good when I've used it.  Usenet Server is an affordable and reliable way to stay in touch with the Usenet.

Review.Titre: never think about it because it always just works
Review.Contenu: It's one of those services you don't notice unless it isn't working and that has never happened during the years I've used it. Figure it's worth 5 stars on account that it's been extremely dependable. I can't compare to the others as this is the only one I use.

Review.Titre: Solid usenet provider, no complaints here
Review.Contenu: usenetserver.com has always been a fast and reliable usenet hosting provider for me, and I can't remember the last time they went down. It's always "just worked" for me 🤙I've been a customer for 6 or 7 years now at this point ...

Review.Titre: It just works and has very good…
Review.Contenu: It just works and has very good retention. The VPN was a little slow couple of years back, but that has improved a lot to almost unnoticable. Account management is straight forward with no BS attached.

I have been a client of Usenetserver for more than 25 years now.  They have consistently delivered a service that has matched or led all their competitors for up-time, retention, and data transmission speeds.  Of equal importance, on those rare occasions when I had to contact their support department, my issues were always resolved quickly, effectively, and with respect.  The Usenet agents I have dealt with, via voice or email, have always been extremely polite, friendly and just plain good at their jobs.  I have always felt like they wanted to help me out, and they have never failed to do so.
You provide service, as advertised.Other than a couple blips of availability over my (how many yrs?)... constant availability.What's not to love?  :)

Review.Titre: The two things which are most important…
Review.Contenu: The two things which are most important to me is selection and persistence.  Usenetserver has both of these.  Great retention of file and a great selection of what has been posted.  I also appreciate the download speeds and the almost negligible down time of their servers.

I've been with them since 2004. Excellent retention and the servers are always up. I get great download speeds as well. I've tried other "premium" servers, but they don't match up. I'll continue to use Usenetserver.

Review.Titre: One of the best Usenet services
Review.Contenu: One of the best Usenet services, because of high speed, great retention time and the very low cost of 20$ per year

Review.Titre: well priced and constant fast downloads…
Review.Contenu: well priced and constant fast downloads and retention. have been using them for years and will stay with them. also the vpn is excellent when needed.
I have been using them for years now, and have never had any problems. Price is reasonable so I will not be changing any time soon. I have recommended them to friends several times.

- Fast (I am downloading with the full bandwith of my 1000mbit connection)- Reliable (in over 15 years of being a customer i dont remember the servers ever being down)- AWESOME retention (over 10 years)

Service is always available. Fast and reliable. VPN works well. I have no idea of what else to say. I cannot think of any time since I have been using Usenetserver when I have been unable to access their servers.

Review.Titre: I find that most articles are complete…
Review.Contenu: I find that most articles are complete if you get them within a day or so, the price is right and I've never seen days of articles disappear as I have with other services, and I've tried quite a few of them. All in all, this so far has been the best service I have used, my only wish was that you had a server in the UK where there are no laws against posting regular TV shows that are shown for free here and on the networks webpages.
No bandwidth cap means I can take full advantage of my 1gb/s connection. Retention of NZBs is great.
I use Usenetserver interface every day for the past 8+ years. I have never encountered down times...in other words, very very reliable.

Review.Titre: Value for money and great Customer Care
Review.Contenu: Works pretty fast in comparison to others. The vpn is value for money.I would recommend it to those interested in having quality in both practical and customer service!On an issue where I needed their understanding and professionalism, I got a very quick answer followed by a solution!

Review.Titre: Run this service as my primary along…
Review.Contenu: Run this service as my primary along with 2 backup sources for redundancy. Usenetserver has been stable and available over 99% of the time. Would not hesitate to recommend
The service functions as expected. The VPN was an added bonus. The VPN rarely disconnects and doesn’t reconnect, better than the service I had before. I have no complaints!
an amazing service, been using this service for more than a decade, NEVER had an issue
I have used them for years and on the couple of occasions that I've had an issue their response from the tech team has been terrific and immediate
retention is good. and reliability is great. already a happy user for many years.
Amazing support, Fast and reliable servers. I have yet to have any issues with the connections. And when you do need help there support staff is quick to reply to tickets.

Nothing bad I could say. Really good speed, I got all out of my 500GBIT lane. Retention was also really really good.But you should buy only on events like cyberfriday or cyberweek or xmas. I pay 18€ per year.

Review.Titre: Good Service, High retention and a fair price
Review.Contenu: Good Service, High retention and a fair price. Not the cheapest provider, but - in my opinion - the best choice if you want to use credit cards for payment.
I have have used Usenetserver for almost 10 years. Super reliable and  fast. I found them on HTPCGuides, thank you for the recommendation!
Been using the service since 2009 and wouldn't change it for any other provider. Best value for my subscription.

speed is as advertised, and no issues with throttling as you may expect, retension is good, article completion is unfortunatly an issue but that could be out of usenetservers control what with take down notices and deliberate flooding of usenet with fake/distorted uploads by movie industry and malware loaded empty large files.overal though good value for money.
First class service provider. Reliable and fast connections. The free vpn service is good to have as well.
Rock solid performance. All you ask from your news group server is reliability and great retention. 5 stars for Usenetsever!
The content I need is almost always available even when it is older.  High reliability and up time.

Review.Titre: Of all this type of services which I’ve…Of all this type of services which I’ve tried a few they are by far the best super reliable what else can I say the bestthebest
Review.Contenu: Of all this type of services which I’ve tried a few they are by far the best super reliable what else can I say
Customer for multiple years now. I've had no problems dealing with them or the service.

Review.Titre: They will not respond to my support tickets
Review.Contenu: OK. I was pleased with the availability of newsgroups, and the ease of setting up Mozilla Thunderbird as a newsreader with their server.Unfortunately, I am still unable to post to any newsgroups, even though I've got a paid account now. On my control panel page it simply says "Posting disabled" with no explanation.This would not be so bad if they would respond to support ticket requests in a timely fashion and just explain the issue to me. But I have submitted several tickets over a period of a week or two, and have not received even one response. When I submit a ticket there is not even an acknowledgement that a ticket has been successfully submitted. I have tried this with several different web browsers, including Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, but the same result each time.If nobody responds to my support requests toward the end of my first full paid month, I will simply cancel before my plan renews. It would be nice though, if that happened, that I could receive a full refund. That is unlikely however, as they won't even respond to me to address my concerns.Update: I finally did a Google search to find the way to create a support ticket, and used email to contact support. They responded almost immediately, although at first they were reluctant to enable posting on my account for fear I was a potential spammer. After a few emails back and forth, I thoroughly explained my purpose in using their service to post to Usenet newsgroups, and they enabled posting on my account.All in all, finally a pleasant experience, but it would still be nice for them to fix their support ticket web form on their site and get it to work. I have altered my original 1-star rating to an unqualified 5-stars.
Been using them for years, stable speed, SSL connection, and very reasonably priced. Love them.
over 5000 days retention, mega ez navigation. excellent product for less than 1oo.oo a year!!!
